entry.title: Yoga Potion Chill Body Spray 120ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Yoga Potion
Type: Aromatherapy
Price: 7.50

CHILL Mist & Body Spray works wonderfully to help promote balanced hormones, spray chest, face, thighs and belly to help alleviate hot flashes or PMS. Also great as a calming body spray throughout the day.

Yoga Potion is a Canadian Company from Kelowna B.C.

All of their products are handmade and blends have been carefully formulated with Master Herbalist Blaine Andrusek. In their own words: "Our balanced healthy energy is necessary to align with and respect the essence of the oils, ensuring the synergistic blends come to market with their purest potential for healing effects and aesthetic enjoyment."

entry.title: Yoga Potion Hemp Infused Massage Oil 120ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Yoga Potion
Type: Aromatherapy
Price: 19.95

Strains & Sprains, our time and tested potion for over 30 years for inflammation pain, is now boosted with healing hemp, with extra terpenes and cannabinoids making this an impressive topical pain management treatment.  Our Hemp Oil is Raw, THC-A,  having no psychotropic effects."  Great for:

  • Inflammation muscle & joint pain
  • Massage Oil

entry.title: Marseille's Remedy Hand Sanitizer 60ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wild Creek Naturals
Type: Aromatherapy
Price: 7.15

Marseille's Hand Sanitizer is more than just a normal sanitizer, it’s a modern rendition of an age-old medicated spray. Approved by Health Canada, Marseille’s Hand Sanitizer kills germs on contact and is gentle on your skin. It is made with all-natural ingredients and has all the topical effects of Marseille’s Remedy. 

Medical Ingredients:

75% grain alcohol (ethanol)

Non-medical ingredients:

vegetable glycerin, purified water and Aloe Vera. Marseille’s Remedy / Syzygium aromaticum (Clove bud oil*), Citrus limon (Lemon oil*), Cinnamomum verum (Cinnamon bark oil*), Eucalyptus polybractea (Blue Mallee Eucalyptus oil*), Rosmarinus officinalis  (Rosemary oil*).

*organic content

entry.title: Junglista Outdoor Spray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wild Creek Naturals
Type: Aromatherapy
Price: 7.15

Junglista is an insect repellent using natural ingredients and an amino acid analog to deter a multitude of pests. Junglist is 100% biodegradable and non-toxic.

Junglista is specially formulated from natural ingredients for the outdoor enthusiasts who are simply exhausted from non-stop flailing.

entry.title: Wild Creek Naturals - Filled Display
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wild Creek Naturals
Type: Aromatherapy
Price: 220.00

NEW at Soul Scents ! Made by Wild Creek Naturals in Salmo BC these 4 products are a great addition to any store.

Display Includes: 8 Essential Oils, 8 Traditional Remedy Balm, 8 Hand Sanitizer & 4 Junglista Outdoor Spray. Testers included for each & measures 8" wide x 11" tall x 8" deep. If displays are not in stock delivery to store will take 2 weeks.

entry.title: Papier d'Armenie
entry.summary:
Vendor: Papier d'Armenie
Type: Incense
Price: 4.00 - 20.00 (4 variants)

Known worldwide as the most ancient natural room deodorizer; since 1885.

 Made from natural ingredients such as benzoin and incense.

Created to perfume your home and eliminate unpleasant odors such as frying, tobacco, cat litter, bathroom or dampness. Bring it with you on your travels : car, vacation home, hotel room.

The absorbent paper used to manufacture Papier d’Arménie® is certified by the Forest Stewardship Council, an independent international organisation to promote the responsible management of the world's forests.

Papier d’Arménie can also be used without burning it to deodorize wardrobes or drawers. Each booklet has 36 pre-cut paper strips, in twelve sheets of 3.

Ceramic holder comes in assorted colours. It has a triangular base with sides of 14.5cm & Dome 8cm in diameter.

entry.title: The 5 Elements
entry.summary:
Vendor: Invocation
Type: Aromatherapy
Price: 16.95

Travel to the heart of nature with one of these 5 scents from Invocation. Each scent evokes an element and promotes a balance based on its energy. Use them as a perfume or room spray. 

Sacred Sound promotes integration, synthesis & thoughtfulness.

Earth promotes openness, stability & balance.

Wind promotes inspiration, determination & courage.

Water promotes kindness, gentleness & confidence.

Fire promotes love, compassion & respect.

entry.title: Rare Essence Essential Oils
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rare Essence
Type: Aromatherapy
Price: 5.25 - 23.25 (48 variants)

Rare Essence sources the finest Essential Oils from around the world, working as closely with the plant farmers and distillers as possible. These oils are extensively tested by an essential oil chemist and are pure, natural & undiluted unless stated. 

There are Single Note Oils and Blends to choose from. 

Displays are available in 1, 2, 3 or 4 tiers and are a perfect way to display this beautiful line. Each Tier must be purchased with 12 different oils (6 units of each) and testers are included. These units are custom ordered to your choice so please allow 2-3 weeks for delivery. Price will depend on the oils purchased to fill the tier, ask for details.

entry.title: Rare Essence Diffusers for Home & Car
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rare Essence
Type: Diffusers
Price: 4.00 - 53.00 (5 variants)

NEW! Lotus Diffuser from Rare Essence will passively diffuse this beautiful blend and requires no plug in to do so! Simply pour the essential oil into the base, place the lotus flower on top and it will begin to release the aroma into the air as it absorbs the essential oil blend.

4fl.oz

entry.title: Rare Essence Perfumes
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rare Essence
Type: Aromatherapy
Price: 15.00

These beautiful roll-on perfumes are made from 100% essential oils in 100% organic jojoba oil. Hand blended in small batches by master perfumers, these perfumes have no irritating synthetics or manufactured fragrances. 

Each perfume is also enhanced with vibrational flower essences which work with your body's energy to influence emotional, physical & mental well-being.

Each Perfume is 10ml.

entry.title: Miwah
entry.summary:
Vendor: Invocation
Type: Aromatherapy
Price: 16.50 - 65.00 (3 variants)

Miwah is the diminutive for Miwahimoon, meaning "natural product which promotes wellness and brings energy". This native essence is more feminine than Chiiyaam and it's a great partner for everyday life as it stimulates creativity and enthusiasm attracting beneficial energies and favorable circumstances. Because of it's revitalizing effects the fragrance is used an appreciated by women as well as men.

entry.title: Triloka Angel Series Incense Sticks
entry.summary:
Vendor: Triloka
Type: Incense
Price: 3.25 - 260.00 (9 variants)

A beautiful series of Incense Sticks connected to the Angels. This incense is formulated to open our hearts and minds to the energy, message and power of the angels. Handmade according to ancient tradition and supports an age old cottage industry. 100% natural botanicals, blended with fragrant wood powders, seeds, roots, leaves, gums, herbs, essential oils and resins.

10 sticks per pack   -Assorted has 7 sticks individually wrapped

100% Pure essential oils blended within a base of jojoba oil (5% essential oils).

Suitable for direct application to the skin in roller bottle. 8ml.

F-411 Root - Sandalwood, Juniper, Hina Flower

entry.title: Chiiyaam Bath Salts
entry.summary:
Vendor: Invocation
Type: Aromatherapy
Price: 9.00 - 18.50 (2 variants)

Composed of sea salts from Brittany France, Jojoba oil and the Chiiyaam as a concentrate (minus the corn alcohol.)

Just 2 tablespoons per bath will help to provide profound relaxation, decrease anxiety and stress on all levels. A lovely energy balancer.

About Chiiyaam

Discover “Chiiyaam” (formerly called Liquid Smudge) which in Cree means “relaxing” a unique energy purifier composed of sixteen botanical species combined according to First Nation’s ancestral procedures, to clear the mind, help one to sleep, to relax, to find new energy, to cleanse the electromagnetic field as well as clear away heavy, negative energies.

entry.title: Chiiyaam
entry.summary:
Vendor: Invocation
Type: Aromatherapy
Price: 16.50 - 80.00 (4 variants)

Discover “Chiiyaam” (formerly called Liquid Smudge) which in Cree means “relaxing” a unique energy purifier composed of sixteen botanical species combined according to First Nation’s ancestral procedures, to clear the mind, help one to sleep, to relax, to find new energy, to cleanse the electromagnetic field as well as clear away heavy, negative energies.

With no need to burn these herbs in order to smudge, this product is perfect in public places, hospitals, at home and at work as it dissipates within seconds.

Made only from Corn Alcohol, Canadian Cedar, Sweetgrass, Buffalo sage, Lavender, Rosemary, mandarin, Spearmint, Eastern Hemlock, Desert Sage, Juniper, Rose, Sandalwood, Spikenard, Tobacco, Cistus, Frankincense, Water.

entry.title: Rare Essence Uplifting Reed Diffuser
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rare Essence
Type: Aromatherapy
Price: 29.95

“Very little grows on jagged rock. Be grounded. Be crumbled so wildflowers will come up where you are.” – Rumi

Our rareESSENCE Uplifting reed diffusers feature an exclusive blend of Spearmint, Peppermint, and Sweet Orange 100% Pure Essential Oils.

Diffusing essential oils is a simple way to incorporate them into your environment with maximum benefit. To diffuse and create a spa-like experience, remove the cork and place the reeds into the rareESSENCE oil blend – you can be sure these blends contain absolutely no solvents, alcohol, petrochemicals, or phthalates!

We suggest rotating the reeds after the first hour and anytime for an extra burst of aroma. Contained within hand-blown Italian glass bottles, both sizes are colourfully decorated. The large 90ml also features a beautiful quote matching the energy of the rareESSENCE signature blends!

Large 90ml Reed Diffuser (with poetic quote).

entry.summary:

Type: Aromatherapy

Diffusing essential oils is a simple way to incorporate them into your environment with maximum benefit. To diffuse and create a spa-like experience, remove the cork and place the reeds into the rareESSENCE oil blend – you can be sure these blends contain absolutely no solvents, alcohol, petrochemicals, or phthalates!

We suggest rotating the reeds after the first hour and anytime for an extra burst of aroma. Contained within hand-blown Italian glass bottles, both sizes are colourfully decorated. The large 90ml also features a beautiful quote matching the energy of the rareESSENCE signature blends!

Small 30ml Reed Diffuser. Large 90ml Reed Diffuser (with poetic quote).
